thread.title: Boston Red Sox NESN color commentator Jerry Remy may have reduced schedule or studio role in '16 (report)
thread.title_full: Boston Red Sox NESN color commentator Jerry Remy may have reduced schedule or studio role in '16 (report)

author: Christopher Smith | csmith@masslive.com
title: Boston Red Sox NESN color commentator Jerry Remy may have reduced schedule or studio role in '16 (report)
text:
Email newsletters comments Boston Red Sox NESN color commentator Jerry Remy may have reduced schedule or studio role in '16 (report) Jerry Remy 
NESN chose not to renew Orsillo's contract and he has been hired by the San Diego Padres as their play-by-play announcer. There's nothing certain with any of this. But there has been talk of a reduced schedule or studio role for Remy. https://t.co/ySDE4pcAmS — Chad Finn (@GlobeChadFinn) September 30, 2015 
WEEI's Kirk Minihane reported NESN is interested in hiring Ron Darling as O'Brien's partner for 2016. Finn confirmed he heard this rumor. 
Darling is in his 10th season working as a game and studio analyst for SNY New York Mets broadcasts. According to two sources, NESN is interested in Ron Darling as Dave O'Brien's partner for Sox telecast next year. — Kirk Minihane (@kirkmin) September 30, 2015
